message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to your endeavors. Given its unique features and potential, I'm offering it to you for $1,500,000. This is a starting point for discussion, and I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am looking to stay within a budget of $800,000. Would you be able to adjust your offer accordingly?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my valuation of the product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.  I believe this offer reflects the true value you'll gain from this product in the long run.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I propose a price of $1,000,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while staying within my financial limits.
